QuestData.Title: I Could Be A Contender
QuestData.Description:
Hold up there, $Gbrother:sister;.
If you are serious about fighting in the Arena you're going to need a manager. Lucky for you, $Gbrother:sister;, I know a guy. He's just had some openings in his roster of fighters and you look like just the type of $c he needs to fill his ranks.
Name is Louison, you can find him at the gate just east of here.
Tell him I sent ya, $Gbrother:sister;.
QuestData.RewardText:
Oh, Anzio sent you? Hah, and here I was thinking you were just another nosy fan.
Yeah, you look like just the $c I need!
